API_Description: Sends out an e-mail message with or without user interaction.

bUI.description: Indicates whether user interaction is required. If true, the remaining parameters are used to seed the compose-new-message window that is displayed to the user. If false, the cTo parameter is required and others are optional.   -  (Acrobat 7.0) When this method is executed in a non-privileged context, the bUI parameter is not honored and defaults to true. See Privileged context.

cCc.description: (optional) A semicolon-separated list of CC addressees.

cBcc.description: (optional) A semicolon-separated list of BCC addressees.

cSubject.description: (optional) Subject line text. The length limit is 64 KB.

cMsg.description: (optional) Mail message text. The length limit is 64 KB.
